entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning early this morning. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:47 AM EDT Monday 8 May 2023
